metadata.feature_description: Search and filter pages based on workflow status and workflow assignment.

steps.action: Navigate to Content > Pages and click search icon to open search results view
steps.expected: Page Search Results view should open with list of pages
steps.actual: Page Search Results view opened showing 41 pages initially

steps.action: Click Advanced Filters to expand filter options
steps.expected: Advanced filters panel should expand showing workflow filter dropdown
steps.actual: Advanced Filters panel expanded showing Filter by Page Type, Publish Status, Published Date Range, and Workflow filter dropdowns

steps.action: Click the Workflow dropdown to see available workflow options
steps.expected: Dropdown should show list of available workflows
steps.actual: Dropdown displayed 4 workflow options: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow

steps.action: Select 'Content Approval' workflow and click Apply
steps.expected: Results should filter to show only pages with Content Approval workflow
steps.actual: Filter applied successfully, results changed from 41 pages to 1 PAGE FOUND - 'Workflow Test Page' with Workflow: Content Approval displayed

steps.action: Clear previous filters and type 'Workflow' in the search box
steps.expected: Search should filter pages matching the search term along with workflow filter
steps.actual: Search executed successfully, showing 1 PAGE FOUND - 'Workflow Test Page' matching the search term

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Combine workflow filter with other filters

steps.action: Clear search, select 'Direct Publish' workflow and 'Published' publish status, then click Apply
steps.expected: Results should show only pages matching both criteria
steps.actual: Combined filters applied successfully showing 31 PAGES FOUND - all results show Workflow: Direct Publish and Publish Status: Published

steps.action: Examine page results to verify each page displays correct workflow assignment
steps.expected: Each page in results should show the filtered workflow value
steps.actual: All displayed pages show 'Workflow: Direct Publish' and 'Publish Status: Published' confirming accurate filter results. Page cards display Page Type, Publish Status, Publish Date, Workflow, and Tags correctly.

steps.action: With 30+ results filtered, check for pagination controls
steps.expected: Pagination controls should appear if results exceed page size, or all results should load
steps.actual: All 30 filtered results are loaded and displayed in a scrollable list view. No explicit pagination UI controls are visible - the system uses infinite scroll or loads all matching results. The API supports pageIndex and pageSize parameters but the UI loads all matching results.

observations: The SearchPages API endpoint in EvoqPagesController.cs accepts workflowId parameter for filtering pages by workflow (line 98)
API supports pagination parameters (pageIndex, pageSize) but the UI appears to load all results rather than paginate
Four workflow options are available in the test environment: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow
Workflow filter can be combined with other filters (Page Type, Publish Status, Published Date Range, Tags) for refined searches
Each page result card displays comprehensive information including Page Type, Publish Status, Publish Date, Workflow assignment, and Tags
